A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely bloody awful. This movie breaks Star Wars. Do not watch\, for so many reasons. I can't even start to describe why this movie is so bad in terms of story telling and in terms of Star Wars lore. Check out Last Jedi reviews on YouTube and judge for yourself. Half a star for the music being good\, and it looking like Star Wars\, so long as you don't think about anything that's happening or why any of it is happening. I'm done with Star Wars. Disney\, you done f*cked it up. Boo.
